speaker: Cinderway Caldera
line: A bowl of black stone filled with drifting snow and stubborn heat. The air tastes of metal and old storms.

speaker: Distant Rumble
line: Not quite thunder. Not quite a heartbeat.

speaker: Your Journal
line: If you need a place to stand your ground, this is one.

choices.text: Look for the next job in the wastes.
Mark Cinderway Caldera as a checkpoint.
Leave before the mountain notices you.

speaker: Cinderway Caldera
line: Snow hisses where it lands. The sound is almost laughter.
